languages.text: "Я не сожалею, что некоторые соратники предпочли покинуть нас. В последнее время они подозрительно шептались о Лорд-капитане".
"I do not regret that some associates chose to leave us. Of late they have been whispering suspiciously about the Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Я не сожалею, что некоторые соратники предпочли покинуть нас. В последнее время они подозрительно шептались о Лорд-капитане".

traits.locale_text: "I do not regret that some associates chose to leave us. Of late they have been whispering suspiciously about the Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I do not regret that some associates chose to leave us. Of late they have been whispering suspiciously about the Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I do not regret that some associates chose to leave us. Of late they have been whispering suspiciously about the Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I do not regret that some associates chose to leave us. Of late they have been whispering suspiciously about the Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “一部分同事选择离开了我们，我并不感到遗憾。他们最近一直在窃窃私语，质疑舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: "I do not regret that some associates chose to leave us. Of late they have been whispering suspiciously about the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “一部分同事选择离开了我们，我并不感到遗憾。他们最近一直在窃窃私语，质疑舰长大人。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne regrette pas que certains associés aient décidé de nous quitter. Ces derniers temps, ils colportaient des rumeurs désobligeantes sur {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: "I do not regret that some associates chose to leave us. Of late they have been whispering suspiciously about the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne regrette pas que certains associés aient décidé de nous quitter. Ces derniers temps, ils colportaient des rumeurs désobligeantes sur {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «No lamento que algunos de nuestros socios nos hayan dejado. Últimamente susurraban cosas sospechosas sobre {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "I do not regret that some associates chose to leave us. Of late they have been whispering suspiciously about the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: «No lamento que algunos de nuestros socios nos hayan dejado. Últimamente susurraban cosas sospechosas sobre {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「私たちの元を去る仲間がいても、後悔はありません。最近、ロード・キャプテンへの疑念をひそひそ口にしていましたので」
languages.original_text: "I do not regret that some associates chose to leave us. Of late they have been whispering suspiciously about the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちの元を去る仲間がいても、後悔はありません。最近、ロード・キャプテンへの疑念をひそひそ口にしていましたので」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ich bedauere es nicht, dass einige Gefährten entschieden haben, uns zu verlassen. Sie flüstern in letzter Zeit auf verdächtige Weise Dinge über den Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "I do not regret that some associates chose to leave us. Of late they have been whispering suspiciously about the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bedauere es nicht, dass einige Gefährten entschieden haben, uns zu verlassen. Sie flüstern in letzter Zeit auf verdächtige Weise Dinge über den Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "I do not regret that some associates chose to leave us. Of late they have been whispering suspiciously about the Lord Captain."

languages.text: "Bazı yandaşlarımızın aramızdan ayrılmasına pişman değilim. Son zamanlarda Lord Kaptan'la ilgili şüpheli şüpheli fısıldaşıyorlardı."
languages.original_text: "I do not regret that some associates chose to leave us. Of late they have been whispering suspiciously about the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Bazı yandaşlarımızın aramızdan ayrılmasına pişman değilim. Son zamanlarda Lord Kaptan hakkında şüpheli fısıldaşmalara dâhil oluyorlardı."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
